main event: A sighting of a brilliant bluish-white object observed in Delray Beach, Florida on 2 February 1955.
interesting points: The object was about 30 to 50 feet in diameter and appeared to have a tail or exhaust., It moved rapidly and erratically through the sky., The observation lasted for approximately 30 seconds., The sighting included a report from a Captain in the United States Marine Corps., Conclusions on the cause of the sighting were marked as unknown.
witness description: report by a Captain in the United States Marine Corps
